#line 26 "C:/Users/conno/Desktop/The-Forge/Examples_3/Unit_Tests/src/16_Raytracing/Shaders/D3D12/DisplayTexture.frag"
struct PsIn {
	float4 position: SV_Position;
	float2 texCoord: TEXCOORD;
};

Texture2D uTex0 : register(t0, space1);
SamplerState uSampler0 : register(s1);

float4 main(PsIn In) : SV_Target
{
    return uTex0.Sample(uSampler0, In.texCoord);
}
